_xResult.title: One Strike Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made cotton maxi with stripes
_xResult.longdesc:
This custom made maxi dress is as suitable for summer as it gets. To the pool, coffee with friends or to markets around town, the soft brushed cotton and sleeveless silhouette will keep you cool and minimize sweat on those burning days. The stripes add a fun and flirty style…pair with your favorite accessories and you’ll look like you just stepped out of a summer catalog!

 

Have fun with EUG's custom made designer clothing! For custom made requests regarding sizing, let the designer know using the button below.
